original_title: 2003 Florida Marlins: The Official World Series Film
overview: The 2003 Florida Marlins make a manager change mid-way through the season hiring 72 year old Jack McKeon and go on an unbelievable run towards the postseason. After both an exciting NLDS and NLCS the Marlins battle the New York Yankees in the 100th Anniversary of Major League Baseball's World Series.
tagline: Florida Marlins vs New York Yankees
title: 2003 Florida Marlins: The Official World Series Film
